name: Chill Gamer
description: Chill Gamer is a user-friendly game review application. Here users can explore and share game reviews.
challenges: It was challenging for me to implement sort and filter together

features.Game Reviews: Browse through a collection of user reviews for the latest games across multiple genres.
features.Add Review: Users can add their own reviews for games, and rate games based on their personal experience.
features.My Reviews: Users can view and manage their own reviews, including the ability to update or delete them.
features.My Watchlist: Add games to your personal watchlist and easily access your favorite ones.
features.Theme Toggle: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable viewing experience.
features.Sort: Easily sort games by rating and year.
features.Responsive Design: Enjoy a seamless experience across all devices, from desktop to mobile.

futureImprovement: I aim to enhance the user experience by resolving the issue of images taking too long to load. Additionally, I plan to redesign the add and update game forms, as I'm not fully satisfied with their current appearance.

name: Volunteer Management
description: A user-friendly platform to manage volunteer opportunities. Users can create, update, delete posts, and volunteer for others’ posts. This project is built with a focus on responsiveness, security, and seamless user experience.
challenges: It was challenging for me to handle the volunteer need number count. but in the end I managed to make it work and

features.Authentication System: Login and Register with email-password authentication and Google login support.
features.Password Strength Validation: Ensures secure passwords with requirements like uppercase, lowercase, and a minimum of 6 characters.
features.Volunteer Post Management: Add volunteer posts with title, category, description, and deadlines. View, update, and delete own posts.
features.Volunteer Participation: Volunteer for posts using a simple request form. Tracks the number of volunteers needed and dynamically updates availability.
features.Search: Search posts by title to easily find relevant volunteer opportunities.
features.Layout: Change layout dynamically between card and table views for better organization.
features.Protected Routes: Secure user-specific content with protected routes, allowing only authorized users to manage posts.
features.Dynamic Document Titles: Set dynamic document titles to improve user engagement and provide better navigation.
features.Dark/Light Mode Toggle: Theme customization for improved accessibility and a comfortable viewing experience.
features.Responsive Design: Seamless experience across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices, ensuring full accessibility on all screen sizes.

futureImprovement: In the future, I plan to improve my site by optimizing its performance with lazy loading and making it faster. I'll focus on enhancing accessibility and ensuring it's mobile-friendly. I'll also add features like user profiles, personalized content, and improve security with two-factor authentication. I aim to boost SEO to make the site more discoverable. Regular updates and monitoring will help keep the site running smoothly and securely.
